text: Hello all.  I am new to the slack channel and just wanted to say Hi.  I am working on a BigCommerce integration with our existing HubSpot account that was set up as a custom integration by an external development team.  I am sure I will have a few questions and look forward to e-meeting everyone!

I am wondering if anyone here has used the grove plugin <http://hubshop.ly|hubshop.ly> for BigCommerce?   We are in the middle of a website replatform to BigCommerce from a custom rails app and I am using this plug in but I was not able to set it up in my HubSpot sandbox environment.  I could not get the plugin to connect.  So I was considering setting our BigCommerce integration that has the active plugin in up as a secondary domain in HubSpot.  However it seems to indicate that I need to upgrade to choose a new domain but we have an enterprise account .
has anyone else used this plugin before and if so do you have any pros or cons I should know about?

basically at this point I have hit a snag where I cant seem to test the properties its pulling over till I figure out how to set the secondary domain or till we launch.  Obviously I am not a fan of the latter but if I cant get this to work I may not have a choice
